item.title: About Me
item.description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m Prince Oforh Asiedu

I’m a passionate security-focused software engineer and open-source security advocate based in Ghana. My work revolves around secure software development and security automation. This site serves as a journal of my learning journey, where I document insights, share research, and showcase the projects I build along the way.

My Background

I have a strong foundation in software engineering, with experience in backend development, cloud computing, and security engineering. My journey began with building scalable web applications, and over time, I developed a deep interest in cybersecurity and DevSecOps.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Get In Touch

I’m always open to collaborations, discussions, and new opportunities in the security and software engineering space. Feel free to reach out using any of the methods below:

Direct Contact

  • Email: princeo.asiedu@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/princeoforhasiedu

Professional Interests

I’m particularly interested in discussing:

  • Open source security projects
  • Security engineering best practices
  • Cloud security architecture
  • Threat intelligence collaboration
  • DevSecOps methodologies

Mentorship & Collaboration

I believe in knowledge sharing and community building. If you’re new to security engineering and seeking guidance, or if you have a security-focused project that needs contributors, I’d be happy to help.

item.title: Beginning My Security Engineering Journey
item.description: My first steps on the path to becoming a security-focused software engineer.
